pax pay pbx pby pcx pcy pdx pdy

adx = pax - pdx
ady = pay - pdy
bdx = pbx - pdx
bdy = pby - pdy
cdx = pcx - pdx
cdy = pcy - pdy

abdeta = adx * bdy
abdetb = bdx * ady
abdet = abdeta - abdetb

bcdeta = bdx * cdy
bcdetb = cdx * bdy
bcdet = bcdeta - bcdetb

cadeta = cdx * ady
cadetb = adx * cdy
cadet = cadeta - cadetb

alifta = adx * adx
aliftb = ady * ady
alift = alifta + aliftb

blifta = bdx * bdx
bliftb = bdy * bdy
blift = blifta + bliftb

clifta = cdx * cdx
cliftb = cdy * cdy
clift = clifta + cliftb

la = alift * bcdet
lb = blift * cadet 
lc = clift * abdet
lab = la + lb

L = lab + lc
